thread.title: #TECH 24 - The dangers of addiction to social media
thread.title_full: #TECH 24 - The dangers of addiction to social media - France 24

author: Shona BHATTACHARYYA
title: #TECH 24 - The dangers of addiction to social media
text:
Depressed? Anxious? Insomniac? Social media may be to blame. This week's Tech 24 warns against the dangers - both mental and physical - of being constantly connected. In the test part of the show we bring you two new smartphones. One uses Wysips technology to turn the screen into a solar panel to help charge the battery. The other is a flip phone by LG. By Shona BHATTACHARYYA
Follow us
